Project Website

Introduction

Welcome to the map scrollytelling app. You can set position, zoom, pitch, and bearing via the top-level props.

Section Title - Squirrels in Central Park

Now we zoom in. A layer is added from a geojson Layer paint properties are passed, and layers are set to turn off when you continue scrolling via the `persist:false` attribute.

Polygon Layer

Now we zoom to a new location. And add a polygon layer of the innundation zone from Hurricane Sandy via GeoJSON endpoint. Layer paint properties are passed (notice they are different from the syntax for the point layer).

London

You can change the position of the overlay div using the position attribute, and can add images using the media attribute.
